SELECT * FROM ( SELECT inner_table.* , ROWNUM AS row_seq FROM ( SELECT sr.lesson_name, p.student_name, p.amount, p.pay_due_date,p.pay_day, p.check_pay, p.pay_code, p.student_id FROM payment p, students_record sr
sr.record_code = p.student_record_no AND sr.lesson_name IN ( (SELECT lesson_name from lesson WHERE teacher_id = #{searchId}) )
AND p.student_name LIKE INITCAP('%${searchKeyword}%')
AND p.pay_due_date BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{searchStartDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(#{searchEndDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND p.check_pay LIKE INITCAP('%${searchKeyword}%')
ORDER BY pay_due_date DESC) inner_table WHERE ROWNUM <= #{endRowNum} ) inner_table WHERE row_seq BETWEEN #{startRowNum} AND #{endRowNum}
